channel.title: OpenBSD Qube with Whonix as NetVM
channel.description: I don't know how to configure manually the network on Standalone Qubes to make sys-whonix work. I can't access the connection on OpenBSD, Debian Standalone, FreeBSD and etc. Only Windows works without have to configure it manually. Can someone help me?

item.title: OpenBSD Qube with Whonix as NetVM
item.dc:creator: bcz
item.description:
That worked thanks. I thought it was the same process as Whonix Virtualbox.

Read full topic
item.source: OpenBSD Qube with Whonix as NetVM

item.title: OpenBSD Qube with Whonix as NetVM

item.description:
1. try a Debian custom Workstation as per Other Operating Systems - Whonix as a hopefully helpful prerequisite exercise
